# pangolin_role (Resource)

Manages an organization role.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "pangolin_role" "example" {
  org_id      = "your-org-id"
  name        = "Example Role"
  description = "A role managed by Terraform"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name of the role.
- `org_id` (String) The ID of the organization this role belongs to.

### Optional

- `description` (String) The description of the role.

### Read-Only

- `id` (Number) The ID of the role.
